tests.name: Alcazar API Credential Test
tests.details: API_ALCAZAR key works. Successfully identified WIRELESS/LANDLINE numbers with carrier info (Verizon, Sprint). Response includes LINETYPE, LEC, STATE, CITY fields.

tests.name: NPL (Number Portability Lookup) Credential Test
tests.details: NUMBER_PROBABLITY_API_ID and NUMBER_PROBABLITY_API_PASS work. Successfully detects mobile/reachable status. Account balance: ~35,428 credits remaining.

tests.name: Neutrino API Credential Test
tests.details: Credentials are valid but FREE PLAN LIMIT EXCEEDED (api-error: 16). User needs to upgrade Neutrino plan or add credits at neutrinoapi.net.

tests.name: SignalWire CNAM Credential Test
tests.details: 401 Unauthorized. The provided API_SIGNALWIRE token does not authenticate. SignalWire expects Basic auth with base64(project_id:api_token). User may need to provide the full project_id:token pair or check the token at signalwire.com dashboard.

tests.name: Auto-Promo Module Syntax Check
tests.details: auto-promo.js loads without errors. All exports (initAutoPromo, promoMessages, PROMO_BANNERS) available.

tests.name: Auto-Promo Banner Integration
tests.details: 3 banner images generated and integrated into sendPromoToUser. Uses bot.sendPhoto with caption for all themes.

tests.name: Language File Promo Keys
tests.details: All 4 language files (en, fr, zh, hi) have promoOptOut and promoOptIn keys.

tests.name: Stop/Start Promo Commands
tests.details: /stop_promos and /start_promos handlers wired in _index.js at lines 2009-2023. Uses autoPromo.setOptOut correctly.

summary.notes: Alcazar and NPL credentials work. Neutrino plan exhausted. SignalWire token format issue. Banner images added to auto-promo system.
